snippet.title: What is the Hebrew translation translation for Chonagge
snippet.description: There is no such word in Hebrew, but it looks like Hanukkah which is spelled חנוכה

snippet.title: What is the Chinese translation for professional translation
snippet.description: In chinese translation "professional translation" means "专业翻译". 专业 zhuān​yè​ 翻译 fān​yì​
